page.title: 06LLANGURIG, EDUCATION
page.content: The village primary school was built in{1873.}It is a two teacher school with{40 children on roll:}25 girls and 15 boys, with an age range of 4 to 11 years. Eleven of the children live on farms. The current{capitation allowance}for books etc. is{24p per child}per week. Pupils travel to school by taxi and school bus. Sixteen pupils have{school dinners}at {70p per meal}(3 have free meals) 21 children bring sandwiches and 3 go home. Pupils transfer to{Llanidloes High {School}at 11+. Some leave the High School at 16+ and go to the{Montgomery {College of Further Education (Newtown) to further their studies or train for a vocation.
